title: Riot's support team
body: Why is it that riot has an extremely slow support team? It feels like they have 10 members all that work in america.

replies.body: I don't have a lot of visibility on EU support, but if it's anything like NA, then they may be bogged down by a lot of the preseason stuff.  Our response time usually isn't long, but I know it could be the case right now depending on the issue.  Sorry for this.  :(  If you want to toss me your ticket number, I can check on the status for you.
